name: Roomba wars
description:
Collect trash to get trash bags(strange colored blobs) and deliver them into the chute in the middle.

Escape to quit, R to restart
Tank controls.
Player 1(RED): WASD 
Player 2(BLUE) IJKL or arrow keys.
Double tap forward or backwards to dash.

You can pop your opponent's bags with the needle on your Roomba and take the trash for yourself. Be careful needles don't like each other so when needles clash you get pushed back.
First to deliver six bags wins, if the timer runs out, the player with the more delivered bags wins.
